website_summaries.verdict: The wireless, exercise-focused Monster iSport Victory BT earphones deliver Bluetooth audio with massive bass and boosted highs.
pros: Powerful audio performance with two listening modes that both feature huge bass
cons: Will not appeal to anyone looking for even a semi-accurate mix
Easy to misfire with multifunction buttons

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Worst. Headphones. Ever. Not because they don't fit or the sound quality is bad. But because they fail. I'm on the third set in two months and they've just given up again (this time left ear crackling). Previous issues: not able to recharge and in ear crackling. Monster need to up their game. Amazon has been faultless in its customer care though.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Believe the poor reviews
customer_reviews.text: The bad reviews are true. I chose to ignore the poor reviews on this product as I have had monster headphones previously. The issue with these sport headphones is they can’t cope with moisture. So if you don’t intend on sweating whilst wearing them or potential being outdoors (in the rain) then they MIGHT be ok. I bought these to train in Running, Cycling, weights etc. They just didn’t stand up to the task. Returned as the broke after a run... decided to pay the extra for more robust headphones
customer_reviews.author: Craig Beadnall

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2nd time of using
customer_reviews.text: These look good and fit very well but have only used twice and have stopped working. They ran out of charge after 30 minutes when out on a run today and won’t charge up now. I am outwith my refund period with Amazon but hopefully can get refund as within 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: G J SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Monster isport Victory in-ear Bluetooth earphones
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for just over a year now. They are the best earphones I’ve ever had. The sound is rich. I love the bass. They fit perfectly and if they stopped working today I’d purchase another tomorrow. I don’t use them for outdoor sport. Indoor, yes. When I put these on I’m in another World.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't work and don't turn on properly
customer_reviews.text: These were a present for my daughter and she has now told me the battery life is bad and they don't turn on properly. I understand they are reconditioned and supplied by Amazon (presumably having been returned previously). Frankly as a long-standing Amazon customer, I would expect better. My daughter has only just felt able to tell me that there were these problems and I don't think there should be a time limit as you suggest for something that is basically not fit for purpose. I would be happy to return and receive a replacement that works if you could provide that. Lisa Knight
customer_reviews.author: lisaknight5

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality good, but earphones not comfortable, no matter what size ear buds etc you put on. Incredibly tempermental - within 6 weeks of purchasing (and not a huge amount of use) they had stopped working reliably, with the headphones being turned on and connected, but no sound coming out being a common issue. The battery started to go down quickly as well. Then, after three months, they stopped working entirely. Wouldn't charge, wouldn't turn on, nothing. I didn't take heed of the poor reviews before buying - don't make the same mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Nix

customer_reviews.title: Constantly fall out and low sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Dubious sound quality and an awful fit. They consistently fall out, even turning your head can be enough to make this happen as the wire grips the back of your neck. Very frustrating as I wanted a new set of headphones for the gym, better quality headphones are available for the same price!
customer_reviews.author: S Walker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, average sound and battery. Would be a good product if it wasn't for the fact that the product broke after 1 month. Sweat gets into the remote which causes the volume to change on its own. When turned off you cannot turn it back on regardless of charge. Even attempting to charge does not work. If you wait 3-4 days headphones work again but as soon as you exercise and turn it off same issue happens again. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one month of light use!!
customer_reviews.text: Within one month of light use I started having playback issues, I could not play music or any other sound from videos etc. Shortly after getting the sound working again the Bluetooth connectivity failed so I could not connect to my phone at all. The headphones then stopped recharging which made them completely useless and a waste of money!! Considering the price of the headphones I am very disappoint by the poor quality and durability of this product. These headphones should not be failing after one month !! I would advise anyone NOT to purchase these headphones, DO NOT waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Mcmahon

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the fit, style, sound and features of these headphones. Battery life was ok. I used them moderately; mix of workouts and general use. I am very careful with my phones to avoid water or impact damage. Then one day they just went dead and wouldn’t charge. Past Amazon return policy but based on others’ experiences I had got the 3 year warranty so will be using that.
customer_reviews.author: polonius948

customer_reviews.title: Perfect after over two years
customer_reviews.text: Had these earphones for 2.5 years and they still work perfectly. The sound quality is great, they're comfortable and really help me focus in the gym or when running outdoors. I don't understand the negative reviews, maybe I got a lucky pair but definitely worth £100 when I bought them. If these broke tomorrow I'd happily purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Akash

customer_reviews.title: Great value & sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound on all volumes. The mic is ok ish, people say it sounds like I'm far away when on a call. Great value and great sound
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Battery stop working and warranty wasnt honoured
customer_reviews.text: Battery only lasted 1 hour after 3 months of use. Then it wouldn't turn on. No big deal factory faults happen. However when I tried to get them replaced the warranty was not honoured because I hadn't bought them from an authorised seller. I had the proof of purchase and the warranty card and was still not helped. Really poor customer service and a terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Willmiller86

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a replacement for a cheaper pair. Easy to connect, comfortable and don’t come loose once you have the fit right. Sound is good if not quite perfect. A nice addition to my daily run!
customer_reviews.author: martin statham

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones really pleased with the build and packaging
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones really pleased with the build and packaging. Battery life is fantastic and sound quality is good, punchy base great for those who need the beat.
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: First time out they worked perfectly. Next time they were dead. I plugged them in to charge before my next run, but they refused to charge. Now there is a solid red light, which is not mentioned anywhere in the manual (the charging light should be blue). I cannot find troubleshooting advice anywhere. Seriously fed up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: So, these were a good pair of headphones while they lasted - excellent fit and really good sound - but they stopped working after less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Glad-that-he-invested-in-Prime Adams

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, two sets have broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in November 2017 and whilst initially satisfied they stopped working after about 5 months. I accepted a replacement but these also stopped working. Both sets were well looked after so I'm not impressed and have asked for a refund rather than another replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the old wired version
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my nephew and had a listen. They dont sound as good as my old wired monster isport victory ive had for years. Strange that.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: ... a Christmas pressant for my son he is very happy with them they fit his ears really well and ...
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for a Christmas pressant for my son he is very happy with them they fit his ears really well and stay in while training , good sound
customer_reviews.author: mrs samantha maiden

customer_reviews.title: did't work
customer_reviews.text: got one set didn't work, got another stopped working after one use!!
customer_reviews.author: stephen dolan

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I’ve had. First pair were fantastic! Second pair unfortunately not doing such a great job. Constant glitching even though my phone is close by. These one’s don’t seem to boost either which is quite odd. All in all, it’s hit and miss!
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my ears, effective noise cancellation and more than adequate sound quality. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Christie

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone
customer_reviews.text: They are are amazing, they sound be alot more money for what they give out. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: josh mayne

customer_reviews.title: Poor bass response...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing sound quality from a brand/model that supposedly caters for bass. The baseline on Coldplay Magic sounds terrible with these yet normal on a £20 pair. Not worth the expense. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: John Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy Monster headphones
customer_reviews.text: Had first pair lasted 4 months and the latest monster headphones will no longer charge after 10 charges, purchased direct through amazon no response.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Spiers

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Bought one pair broke after two uses., got a replacement pair broke after two uses..
customer_reviews.author: Conor Mathews

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality and sound! The £25 ones much much better and efficient
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mckendry

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish lasted about 2 weeks then stopped working don’t waste ur money
customer_reviews.author: miss dawn yates

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. How do I return this
customer_reviews.text: Hi my earphones stopped working after 4 months!! Just doesn’t turn on! Very disappointed. How do I return this
customer_reviews.author: K A Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound
customer_reviews.text: Bad sound ...tinny Charge didn’t seem to last But did stay in ear and conveient neck wire
customer_reviews.author: Mr Guy Downer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT buy this product. They broke within 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT buy this product. They broke within 2 months and amazon refused to take them back as the returns window was closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 month life span....dont buy
customer_reviews.text: these lasted less than 3 months before dying... i used them when exercising (running generally) sound quality poor,
customer_reviews.author: Richard Willis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed them while they lasted. Stopped working after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Parita

customer_reviews.title: and treble good. overall one of the better ear phones on ...
customer_reviews.text: decent pair of head phones, at least they fit snuggly into the ear which was a big important point when selecting ear phones. the sound quality is just about right, when you select turbo bass or whatever its called does improve bass. mids are clear, and treble good. overall one of the better ear phones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EPIC
customer_reviews.text: Bad bad bad bad bad & when I say bad, I mean Good. Seriously only had a few hours of use so far so can't comment on lifespan + battery life but the sound quality, look and quality of the product is next level. Had a sony pair of bluetooth headphones before and these blew them out of the water completely !!!!!!! AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I'll start off by saying that they fit in my ears great and never fell out or started to slip. That's about all I have that's good to say about them. After 3-4 workouts, they started to disconnect, replay songs, adjust volume on songs, or turn off randomly. Then they just completely stopped working. The battery had just been fully charged so that wasn't an issue. In fact, just to make sure, I attempted to charge them again and the little light flashed blue/purple for a while and then just turned off again, even while on the charger. If you buy them, make sure to hold on to the original packaging for at least a month afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: John Gregorio

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product with high sound quality. This order was shipped and delivered within two days, just in time for my last minute Christmas shopping. I gifted this pair of headphone to a friend and she loves it. She wore the headphone during weight training and cardio and they did not fall once. I highly recommend this to anyone who is looking for a pair of headphone to wear to the gym or when exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Ling Zhong

customer_reviews.title: Fair for price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price! Noise cancelling is excellent for what I use it for (mowing and weed eating) and sound QUALITY is great. Only complaint I have is they could stand to be a little louder. Battery life is decent. Takes me about 4-5hrs to finish my yard and they last the entire time without fail.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R.

customer_reviews.title: Item stopped working after 5 months, iGlam-one is NOT an authorized distributor,
customer_reviews.text: Negative reviews were correct in that the headphones stopped working after 5 months of exercise use (HIIT, Cycling, Trail Running). iGlam-one is not an authorized distributor, and Asurion does not assume financial responsibility until the OEM warranty has lapsed, effectively leaving me with trash. Caveat Emptor!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the worst investments I have ever made on electronic equipment. After 6 months of light use (1-2x week), the battery stopped charging (apparently rust on the charging port) and it simply stopped connecting to my phone during a run (my hypothesis is that sweat got into the circuit). Poor audio quality, poor fit, poor noise cancellation, poor battery life (when it worked), I really regret having got this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Laranja Palhares

customer_reviews.title: Broke in first week
customer_reviews.text: After loving the fit and ability of these headphones to stay in during my workout I was thoroughly upset when they broke after 5 days use. The headphones simply stopped charging and no longer would turn on. They had the smell of a bad battery which I assume means the battery in the headphones broke and possibly overcharged and burnt up. I would advise anyone looking to buy wireless headphones to look elsewhere as these headphones lasted a mere 5 days for me.
customer_reviews.author: runner17

customer_reviews.title: they cut out quite a bit throughout my workouts. ...
customer_reviews.text: they cut out quite a bit throughout my workouts. 3 weeks after I bought them, they randomly stopped working during a run. They were fully charge, but to make sure I plugged them back in when I got home and sure enough the battery light won’t even turn on. Very disappointing since they’re very expensive for a set of ear phones.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: DON’T BUY THESE.
customer_reviews.text: I bought them in June. They died in September. Monster’s website says they are warranties for 1 year. I have reached out to Monster 3 different ways over the last month. They have yet to respond to any of these requests. If they don’t stand by their warranty, why do they even claim to have one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good service, quick shipping, reliable product.
customer_reviews.text: I lost one AirPod and was looking for a replacement. Monster Isport is half of the cost and worked with iPhone, iPhone, MacBook very well. The voice quality is high, the battery life is long, the cable is never tangled!
customer_reviews.author: Leon Z.

customer_reviews.title: Lower Cost and Prompt Delivery of Product, but most of all - High Audio Quality,
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Blue Monster iSport Victory Bluetooth Wireless in-Ear Headphones that has a very good audio quality with clear and delicate sounds and only cost less than half of the cost of AirPods but worked very well with Apple products . It was also promptly delivered within 24 hours of order. Like it a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: JINGHARNG LUO

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and sweat resistance
customer_reviews.text: Great sport wireless for price point. I use as backup for running and cardio. Have had no issues with sweat - volume fairly loud also. Not as loud as Powerbeats 3 - but PB’s don’t resist sweat - I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Natmun

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.  Stopped working after 2 runs.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality used on 2 runs and stopped working. I only purchased these thinking they would be as good as the wired version that I had for several years with not issue. Never again will I purchase a bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Good value. They stay comfortably In ear without falling out.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Sound cancellation works well. They are comfortable as stay firmly in the ear even during rigorous activity. I use them for when I riding my motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Shemesh

customer_reviews.title: Can only connect to one device and that’s the end.
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell you can only connect these to one device and then they are permanently wed to one another. Very annoying as I have multiple devices I wanted to use these for.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Won’t lasr
customer_reviews.text: This is second monster product to fail in under 2 months. Monster will not back warranty if there products sold on amazon. Do not purchase on line
customer_reviews.author: Richard Grucz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last at all
customer_reviews.text: The first pair worked about 5 times before dying. My second pair died after only one use. I got a refund after that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Roda

customer_reviews.title: No return if you have a problem!
customer_reviews.text: I just used once and stop Working! I send a email to the Monster and nobody answer me, so I don’t think it’s a good product!
customer_reviews.author: Mau Laranjeira

customer_reviews.title: Not worth even half the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Sound was great until it completely died would not turn on after just a few months. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is the mic, it is poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 2 weeks of use
customer_reviews.text: I used these a total of 6 times. The battery does not hold a charge. Will be sending to Monster for warranty repair.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound was amazing. I did not like that after the third time of use that did not work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Pinheiro

customer_reviews.title: So really bad and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: They stop working 2 weeks after the first use. So really bad and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Device stopped working after second day of use. Will not power on or sync.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working only months in. Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Greg Jones

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in September 2017 and here we are February 2018 and they no longer work. Several times I have been at the gym and the wireless headphones completed disconnected and wouldn't even turn back on. And no, it wasn't the battery. I always have it charge and always checked the level to make sure it was fully charged. I loved them while they worked but am disappointed they didn't even make it to 1 year. Waste of money. I'm tryi my another pair, we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Myzelle P. Law

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as past isport
customer_reviews.text: Over the weekend I purchased the new isport wireless headphones. First pair lasted an hour on the stairmaster before shutting off, would not turn back on. Exchanged defective headphones for another pair, back up on stairmaster today and headphones stopped working after a half hour. NOT AS DURABLE as past products. Apparently my sweating was too much for the volume/power in line housing on the wire which appears not to be water resistant. How can these be labeled as SPORT headphones? How about a true sport headphone without the inline control knob on the wire which collects sweat? Horrible, I guess I will try Jaybirds X3 tomorrow. 👎👎👎👎👎👎😖😖😖😖😖
customer_reviews.author: DAJ

customer_reviews.title: Overall great price for the product and half the price of AirPods !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to workout with and not have to have my phone connected to my headphone. Less wires but not totally free hanging like they can fall out. These work perfectly. It fits the ear great and when you want to take them out you just hang around the neck if you would like. Sound quality is great, Noise cancelling is great, And stays in the ear!
customer_reviews.author: C. A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality terrible
customer_reviews.text: Ugh, these were a mistake. Save yourself the trouble and go right for the JBL reflect mini 2. Sounds better and much more compact. The sound quality on these is terrible. Tried both sound modes and it's muffled and muddy sounding. Good bass but that is it.
customer_reviews.author: Clayster

customer_reviews.title: Usual Monster. Good Sound and Fit. Poor Build Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! Sounds good! Built Terribly! Usual Monster Had for less than 3 months and now they will not turn on. Had 3 pairs of the wired version a few years ago and all quick working as well. Thought it was the cord and took a gamble with wireless but appears to just be crappy quality to expect from Monster. Now to see how long they take to replace!
customer_reviews.author: Bijan Noghrehkar

customer_reviews.title: Suspect quality/Poor customer support
customer_reviews.text: I wore them to the gym for 4 months. They stopped holding a charge and the wire began to fray. I contacted Monster and they told me without a receipt they can't do anything. Who holds on to receipts for months?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be faulted
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be bassy but I found sound to be realistic with great clarity and response extended to high and low frequencies. Good for running with tangle free cord and waterproof/washable construction. They pair quickly with everything and do a fair job of excluding noise. Work well as phone accessory too with clear sound both ways. I had a similarly designed pair from one of Amazon's many Chinese marketplace sellers and these Monster earphones are far better.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin Stephens

customer_reviews.title: A great disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I chose these after ready very positive review on the T3 website comparing different models. For the first three times I used them I agreed with everything in the review about sound quality, fit, ease of operation etc. However, on the fourth occassion, while in use they just started crackling and then gave up completely. Not only had the Bluetooth connection failed but there was no response to the on off controls and neither would the battery charging light come on. I returned for a refund but having now seen that my experience was not isolated I will be looking elsewhere for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Spiked

customer_reviews.title: I can't recommend them enough
customer_reviews.text: These are the best in-ear head phone I have ever bought. I have always been a fan of Sennheiser which in fairness have served me well. If you like to run to music and want good bass these are the best. I cant recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Evans

customer_reviews.title: Earphones
customer_reviews.text: These earphones give excellent sound quality. And the innovative earclip is an added bonus for me as my earphones usually fall out, but with these they stay firmly and comfortably in place. Another plus point is the reflective cable, which is a great safety addition for when walking or running on dark mornings or evenings.
customer_reviews.author: kehs

customer_reviews.title: Very good listening experience
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these in-ear headphones is excellent. I found it very easy to pair with my tablet for a great listening experience and the volume control and track forward controls are straight-forward. Easy to charge too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Bretts

customer_reviews.title: 4 pairs - everone just stops working
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased and subsequently had to replae these headphones 4 times! everytime its the same issue, I use them for a few weeks and then suddenly they just stop working. Don't turn on, don't charge, nothing.! utter junk! today im sending htem back for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless headphones. They fit really well and make a very comfortable earpiece. The quality of audio is also fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: litlight

customer_reviews.title: hopeless
customer_reviews.text: I resented having to buy blue tooth earphones for an iPhone which no longer accepted one of the many headphones I already own. But you have to have music in your life so I shelled out for these. They were OK when they worked but they failed after 2 weeks use. Really? Pretty pathetic build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Morris

customer_reviews.title: They stop working
customer_reviews.text: When they worked they were great, ideal for the gym with great quality sound then one day after around 4 months they just stopped working! No idea why.. seems the same has happened to many others so won’t bother trying another pair...
customer_reviews.author: Tobes

customer_reviews.title: As good as Beats
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to wait for Apple Airpods but they've been delayed and also apparently aren't good for sport so we tried these Monster iSport instead. Now Monster used to be involved with Beats headphones and you can tell as these sound very similar to Beats in terms of their noise profile, they were very quick to setup, the Bluetooth works for about 6 metres strongly and they really are lovely. A good price at around 50 pounds less than the new Beats equivalents. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Scott

product_meta.title: Monster Isport Victory Bluetooth Wireless in-Ear Headphones (Earbuds) - Black with Microphone, Sports Headphones, Running, Noise Isolation
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe secure fit of the disport Victory gives you 90% noise isolation. A higher level of noise isolation means you won’t be distracted by noises around you, allowing you to focus all your attention on your personal goals. Everyone sweats while working out, and the salts and minerals in sweat can damage sensitive electronics like headphones. The Victory is fully sweat proof and has an IPX 5 rating. The earbuds and sport clips can be rinsed or wiped after use and are resistant to microbial build up. We understand that sometimes you won’t use your sports headphones to train, so we’ve included two sound profiles with the Victory – Normal and Turbo. Bass-driven music is known to be a motivator for lots of different exercise and training regimes, as well as a big component of faster music at the 130/140 bpm level that’s known to be a perfect accompaniment to running or faster types of exercise. So Turbo mode kicks up the bass and retunes the midst and highs to give your music, and your motivation, more attack. Features Pure Monster Sound wirelessly Two Pure Monster Sound profiles (warm up and sport) 8+ hours playback Durable and sweat proof Secure fit ear-hooks 3 sizes of ear-tips in the box Includes USB charging cable and soft carry pouch Reflective cable Specifications Headphone Type: Earbuds and In-Ear Noise Isolation: Yes Wired/Wireless: Wireless Adults/Kids: Adults Bluetooth Enabled: Yes Microphone: Yes Foldable: No Additional Features: Durable Wireless Range: 20 ft. Talk Time (hrs.): Up to 8 Hours Color: Black Included Items Monster disport Victory In-Ear Bluetooth Sport Headphones (Black) Monster Micro USB Cable Monster Soft Carry Pouch Monster 5 Sets of In-Ear Tips Monster 3 Sets of In-Ear Sport Clips Monster disport Fitting Guide Monster Quick Start Guide Monster 1 Year USA .
feature_bullets: Pure Monster sound: music is proven to increase athletic performance by up to 15%, Whether it's your first trip to the gym or you're a seasoned athlete. Monster signature ingredient for import delivers crystal clear details, with pumping bass to keep you motivated through your training.

Durable and sweat-proof: everyone sweats while working out and the salts and minerals in sweat can damage sensitive electronics like headphones. The victory is fully sweat proof and has an ip 5 rating. The earbuds and sport clips can be rinsed or wiped after use and are resistant to microbial build up and the control Talk is Sealed tight and has a cover for the Micro USB charge input.

Bluetooth connectivity: worrying about where your headphone cable is while doing your chosen activity has been a problem with sports headphones for years. Untethering yourself from your device gives your body The ability to move freely and you're less likely to damage your equipment or yourself! Victory has Bluetooth 4. 0 with apt-X to deliver your music at the highest possible quality. This is wireless that sounds as good as wired.

8+ hour battery life: Battery life is one of the top considerations for a pair of wireless headphones - if it's not long enough, the headphones spend more time on charge than in your ears. Victory gives more than 8 hours from the integrated rechargeable batteries, so you can use them on the commute as well as in the gym.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars285 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
